alert.note: Alert for Jasper; Marshall; Poweshiek; Tama (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 23 at 8:17PM CDT until April 23 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Poweshiek County in central Iowa... Marshall County in central Iowa... Tama County in central Iowa... Eastern Jasper County in central Iowa... * Until 900 PM CDT. * At 817 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Conrad to 9 miles northwest of Rock Creek Lake to near Monroe, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Broadcast media. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Marshalltown, Newton, Grinnell, Toledo, Tama, Traer, Brooklyn, Dysart, Iowa Speedway, Meskwaki Casino, Rock Creek Lake, Gladbrook, Le Grand, Victor, Kellogg, Garwin, Gilman, Albion, Holiday Lake and Malcom. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 166 and 204. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
